description:
Repel bugs without offending your skin. This non-irritating and unscented insect repellant provides 10-12 hours of protection and comes in a 100ml package that’s carry-on approved on most airlines.

  • Unscented and non-irritating to skin
  • Non-oily, non-greasy and non-sticky
  • Won't damage plastics and other synthetic materials
  • Provides 10-12 hours of protection against black flies, mosquitos and ticks
name: PiActive DEET FREE Travel Size Insect Repellent Pump Spray 100ml
